introduction-full.line1: We at Mentor-Cards believe that the processes of introspection, growth, and development should take place in the best possible way
introduction-full.line2: with minimal dependence on the environment and changing reality.
introduction-full.line3: 2020 will be remembered as a year that changed world orders in so many ways.
introduction-full.line4: We experienced what it is to turn inward, and we acted as we knew in the unknown conditions that were created in our environment.
introduction-full.line5: We trained ourselves for the new world. We continued to train and treat, and this time in front of the screens.
introduction-full.line6: From this place, at this time, and with the joint thinking of senior coaches in the country and card experts - we established Mentor-Cards.
introduction-full.line7: Mentor-Cards is a friendly platform for working with cards in digital and frontal meetings
introduction-full.line8: with an emphasis on the best user experience.
introduction-full.line9: Cards are among the most powerful tools in the worlds of coaching and therapy.
introduction-full.line10: Cards shuffle, bypass the subconscious, open and develop.
introduction-full.line11: Cards help us as professional process leaders to sharpen and specify the most suitable way for our client.
introduction-full.line12: The world is changing and developing and we have chosen to grow with it.
introduction-full.line13: We are glad that you chose to grow with us.

introduction-partial.line7: We are glad that you chose to grow with us.

bio-content-2.line5: MBA in Business Administration, group facilitator, and supervisor for coaches.
bio-content-2.line6: Versatile, brave, loyal to the good, breathes deeply.

bio-content-3.line4: Software and Information Systems Engineer B.Sc

digital-cards.question: Why use digital card decks? What's the advantage?
digital-cards.answer: Digital card decks change the game and give you freedom. No more struggling with physical decks, forgetting to bring materials, or realizing you're missing the right tools. With a Mentor Cards subscription, you have immediate access to 40+ professional card decks—any device, any time, anywhere. And there's more: every deck features a **"Collaborative Mode" button** —just one click opens this deck for **unlimited collaborators** , who can join and interact with you live—from phones, tablets, or desktops, anywhere in the world. This isn't a replacement for physical cards—it's the next level. Always available, always ready, always at your command.

community-vs-pro.question: What's the difference between Community Membership and a Mentor Pro subscription?
community-vs-pro.answer1: Community Membership is free and open to all. You get a taste of our world: two digital card decks, guidebooks, full access to platform features, open inspiration sessions, and a monthly newsletter with fresh content—a great start, implemented easily.
community-vs-pro.answer2: Mentor Pro is our professional subscription for those who guide processes and work with people. You'll receive full access to dozens of card decks, advanced guidebooks, a personal onboarding session, professional training workshops, a platform to showcase your creations—and everything you need to make your presence as a facilitator truly memorable, creative, and impactful.

upgrade.question: I'm already part of the community—why should I upgrade to Mentor Pro?
upgrade.answer: Mentor Pro is designed for those ready to take their work to the next level. The community provides inspiration, but true impact comes from having access to **all** the tools: dozens of expert decks, rich guidebooks, ready-to-use exercises, and up-to-date insights from the field. Plus, you'll join professional workshops, gain exposure, and build a strong, visible presence in the mentor world. Mentor Pro means more tools—and a bigger stage.

cancel.question: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
cancel.answer: Absolutely. You can cancel automatic payments at any time through your account settings on our site. No long-term commitments—so there's no need to explain yourself. Important: Once a payment is processed, it cannot be refunded retroactively. You'll receive a reminder before your subscription renews to ensure you're in control.

custom-deck.question: I've created my own card deck—can I feature it on the site?
custom-deck.answer: Definitely! We believe every creator has a unique voice—and at Mentor Cards, they deserve a stage. Any community member can submit a deck and receive support to upload it to the platform. Your deck will get a dedicated page, appear in our "New on the site" section, and be promoted to thousands of mentors. You can also lead a community session and share your creative story. This option is open to everyone—but Mentor Pro subscribers receive **significant discounts** on publishing and promotional support.

organization.question: I'm working in an organization—do you offer a customized plan?
organization.answer: Yes, we do. Mentor Cards offers tailored solutions for institutions, nonprofits, healthcare organizations, education systems, and welfare services. You'll receive a multi-user license, professional guidance for teams, onboarding support, and integration options for existing programs. Just reach out to us—we'll happily build the best plan for your needs.

deck-choice.question: What if I'm not sure which deck to choose or how to use it?
deck-choice.answer-intro: That's precisely why we're here. At Mentor Cards, you don't have to guess—we provide smart tools and human support to guide you confidently:
deck-choice.point1: Our platform features an intelligent search engine—filter decks by meeting purpose, card type (image, word, values, etc.), creator's name, or common keywords like "empowerment" or "self-esteem."
deck-choice.point2: Each deck comes with a professional guidebook—including ideas, guiding questions, and hands-on examples.
deck-choice.point3: The Mentor Community is ready to answer questions and share inspiration based on real-world experiences.
deck-choice.point4: Mentor Pro members also receive a one-on-one onboarding session with an expert to tailor deck choices and workshop designs to your specific needs.
deck-choice.point5: Unsure? Just reach out via chat, email, or through the community. You're never alone in this journey.

buttons.how-to-work-with-digital-card-set: How to work with a digital card set?

content1.paragraph1: Mentor-Cards is an innovative digital platform that allows coaches, mentors, and therapists from various fields to work with reflective cards online!
content1.paragraph2: Mentor-Cards has a huge variety of card sets, so you can match the card set to your client.
content1.paragraph3: You can connect to Mentor-Cards via computer, mobile phone, and tablet!

content4.p1: Each card set on the site comes with a unique guidebook for it.
content4.p2: To use the guidebook, select a card set and click on the "Guidebook" button located in the center of the page.
content4.p3.1: Guidebooks contain dozens of questions and ideas for various activities using the selected card set -
content4.li2: Suggestions for working with more than one card - process work
content4.li4: Suggestions for working with word cards (in word card sets)
content4.p4: Also, there is a division for questions when the cards are revealed or hidden (each of the methods has its unique advantages).
content4.h1: How to use the guidebook during a meeting?
content4.p5.1: The guidebook interface is intelligently designed to allow only you to view the questions and ideas in a separate work window so that the participant .
content4.p5.2: Will only view the card set and not the book itself  p6 This allows you, the facilitators, to work comfortably with the guidebook during the meeting and write notes in the book itself during the meeting.
content4.p7: There is no need to memorize or remember the questions, everything appears in front of your eyes all the time!
content4.pBold: Instructions for using the ZOOM software (there are similar options in other video software such as: Skype, Teams and more):
content4.ol1: On the "All Card Sets" page, choose the card set you want to use.
content4.ol2: Click on the "Guidebook" button located on the upper left side of this page.
content4.ol3: In the ZOOM software, click on the - "SHARE" button located in the center of the ZOOM application and in its lower part.
content4.ol4: You should choose to share the screen for your browser where the card set is displayed. Note that the default option is to display the entire screen and we do not want that, but only your browser.

p1.b: The card sets on the site are divided into different categories -
p1.text1: Picture cards, word cards, picture+word cards, question cards, message cards, and more.
p1.br: You can mark the desired category and display only the cards from that category on the 'All Card Sets' page.

p2.b: The card sets on the site are constantly updated -
p2.text: We add new cards to existing sets and create additional collaborations with external creators to maintain a refreshing and dynamic experience for our customers.

p3.text: and thus create a unique category of favorite card sets for you, which will be saved on the 'All Card Sets' page and displayed at the top of the page as long as you choose. Have you exhausted a particular card set? Remove the heart mark and choose a new favorite card set!

p4.text: contains the card sets we chose for you from external creators - we also offer a digital solution for card set creators from the country and the world and choose for our customers the best sets!

p5.text: free and free access to selected card sets from various categories

p6.text: contains various card sets where you will find coaching questions, advancing, purposeful and empowering every process and every meeting.

p7.text: is built on the projection mechanism that allows the participant a large response space and the ability to express his inner world with various images and metaphors.

p8.text: helps to start or end any meeting with a powerful message, for a correct process of drawing conclusions and significant insights.

p9.text: was created because the wisdom of Kabbalah teaches us that every holiday is a gate in the dimension of time, which opens at a certain time of the year and influences us. The holidays are a great opportunity to integrate work with cards!

content6.span1: Join one of our programs and receive -

li1.b: A guidebook attached to each card set -
li1.text: Dozens of powerful questions and various suggestions for work.

li2.text: Open and hidden cards, random card selection, shuffling, multiple selection for procedural work, and more…

li3.text: Additional card sets and new work techniques that are constantly updated by our in-house creators and external creators.

li1.text: Join our mentor community and enjoy free access to selected card sets.

li2.text: Mainly recommended for use in point events, conferences, short workshops, one-time events, etc.

li3.text: The program is recommended for people who know and love to incorporate cards as part of their toolbox. Pay in advance for 12 months and enjoy a 30% discount! The payment is made once and all the site services are open for you for the next year.

content6.p1: All site users enjoy free access at no cost to the card sets in the 'Free Trial Sets' category.
content6.p2: At the end of the program period, the program is automatically renewed for another period, we send an email 7 days before recharging.
content6.p3: You can cancel the automatic charge at any time through the "User Details" area on the site and click on "Cancel Automatic Charge".
content6.p4: No cash refunds will be given for partial billing periods on the site.

content7.p1: The first step in introspection begins with a pause.
content7.p2: The pause allows us to ask ourselves questions, and to check whether we are in the right direction for us.
content7.p3: From introspection, conclusions can be drawn and a forward action plan can be built.
content7.p4: "Cards Unfold" - bypasses of consciousness, help us reach deeper layers within us.
content7.p5: Cards expand our point of view beyond our familiar comfort zone and offer us a variety of opportunities and new ways of thinking.
content7.span: Key principles in working with cards

ol1.b: Before each card draw, it is recommended to ask a question.
ol1.text1: After drawing the card, allow time for the chooser to introspect the card and let the asked question resonate.
ol1.text2: Do not rush to ask another question.

ol2.b: The truth is in the eyes of the card chooser and therefore all answers are correct.
ol2.text1: There is no good or bad outcome.
ol2.text2: The way the card chooser relates to his cards, expresses his personal perception and beliefs.
ol2.text3: It is right to allow full legitimacy to the choice and personal interpretation in order to create a safe space.

ol3.b: The guidebook offered for each card set is only a recommendation,
ol3.text1: It is not mandatory and we even encourage you, to write your own questions and ideas and therefore we have created a dedicated place in the guidebook where you can type things before the start of the meeting and even during it.

ol4.b: At any given moment, a card can be added or replaced.
ol4.text1: Before doing so, it is recommended to ask the card chooser - what in this card creates resistance in you?
ol4.text2: What is the reason you did not connect to the card? There are no good or bad cards.

ol5.b: The choice of cards is correct for the present time and describes the interpretation, feelings, existence, and spirit of the card chooser at this moment.
ol5.text: At a different time or situation, a different reaction may arise.

content8.p1: The moment you choose a card set to work with, you have 5 buttons at the top of the screen:
content8.p2_text: - By clicking on the button, you can choose which side of the cards will be visible.
content8.p3_text: - By clicking on the button, you can mark up to 5 cards and display them in an enlarged form on the screen.
content8.p4_text: - Like in the "real world", clicking on the shuffle button changes the order of the cards.
content8.p5_text: - By clicking on the button, a random card will be selected from the card set and displayed in an enlarged form on the screen.
content8.p6_text: - Allows hiding of specific cards. By clicking on the button, you can hide cards that you are not interested in working with at the current time. Once you exit the card system or refresh the page, all the cards you chose to hide will reappear.
content8.p7_text: - Opens in a separate screen. Contains a description of the specific card set, questions and ideas for one-on-one work, procedural work, and group work divided into visible or hidden cards.

mat-expansion-panel1.p1: Mentor-Cards is an innovative digital platform that allows mentors, coaches, and therapists from various fields to work with projective cards online!
mat-expansion-panel1.p2: Mentor-Cards has a huge variety of card sets, so you can tailor the card set to your client.
mat-expansion-panel1.p3: You can also find on the site card sets that we have created, as well as card sets of quality creators from outside.

mat-expansion-panel2.mat-panel-title: How to connect to the site?
mat-expansion-panel2.text: On the upper right side - click on the "Login/Register" button. A window will open in the center of the screen with 2 options: register a new user or login an existing user. Choose to register a new user and fill in the details or choose a simple and quick login via Google.

mat-expansion-panel3.mat-panel-title: How to enter a benefit code?
mat-expansion-panel3.text: In order to enter a benefit code, you need to login / register to the site. On the "All Card Sets" page, on the upper right side, there is a prominent orange button that says "Do you have a benefit code?". Clicking on the button opens a small window where you enter the benefit code you received. Click on "OK" and that's it, you got the benefit!

mat-expansion-panel4.p1_1: Each card set on the site comes with a unique guidebook for it.
mat-expansion-panel4.p1_2: To use the guidebook, choose a card set and click on the "Guidebook" button located in the center of the page.
mat-expansion-panel4.p1_3: The guidebooks contain dozens of questions and ideas for various activities using the selected card set -

ul.li2: Suggestions for working with more than one card - procedural work
ul.li4: Suggestions for working with word cards (in word card sets)

mat-expansion-panel4.p2_1: Also, there is a division for questions when the cards are visible or hidden (each of the methods has its unique advantages).
mat-expansion-panel4.h1: How to use the guidebook during a meeting?
mat-expansion-panel4.p3_1: The guidebook interface is smartly built to allow only you to view the questions and ideas in a separate work window so that the participant
mat-expansion-panel4.p3_2: will see only the card set and not the book itself.
mat-expansion-panel4.p3_3: This allows you, the guides, comfortable work in front of the guidebook during the meeting and writing notes in the book itself while the meeting.
mat-expansion-panel4.p3_4: There is no need to memorize or remember the questions, everything appears in front of your eyes all the time!
mat-expansion-panel4.p_bold: Instructions for using ZOOM software (there are similar options in other video software such as: Skype, Teams, etc.):

ol.li1: On the "All Card Sets" page, choose the card set you want to use.
ol.li2: Click on the "Guidebook" button located on the upper left side of this page.
ol.li3: In the ZOOM software, click on the - "SHARE" button located in the center of the ZOOM application and in its lower part.
ol.li4: You should choose to share the screen for your browser in which the card set is displayed. Note that the default option is to display the entire screen and we do not want that, just your browser.

all_capabilities.normal: Open and hidden cards, random card selection, shuffling, multiple selection for process work and more...

dynamic_content.normal: Additional card sets and new work techniques that are updated regularly by our home creators and external creators.

free_plan.normal: Grants use of sets under 'Free Trial Sets'.

monthly_plan.normal: Grants use of home card sets for a month.

annual_plan.normal: Pay in advance for 12 months and enjoy a discount on the price! Pay in advance.

vip_plan.normal: Quality card sets from external creators. Each card set can be purchased in a monthly or annual plan according to the price set by the card set creator. Mentor-Cards customers enjoy a fixed and special price starting from - 9.9 NIS per month.

cancellation_policy.part1: All site users enjoy a trial period before choosing the plan.
cancellation_policy.part2: At the end of the plan period, the plan is automatically renewed for another period, we send an email 7 days before performing the charge again.
cancellation_policy.part3: You can cancel the automatic charge at any time through the "User Details" area on the site and clicking on "Cancel Automatic Charge".
cancellation_policy.part4: No cash refunds will be given for payments for partial billing periods on the site.

mat_expansion_panel_header.mat_panel_title: Key Principles in Working with Cards

first_step.part1: The first step in introspection begins with a pause.
first_step.part2: The pause allows us to ask ourselves questions, and to check whether we are in the right direction for us.
first_step.part3: From introspection, it will be possible to draw conclusions and build a plan of action forward.
first_step.part4: "Cards reveal" - bypassing consciousness, help us reach deeper layers within us.
first_step.part5: Cards expand our point of view beyond the comfort zone we are familiar with and offer us a variety of opportunities and new ways of thinking.

mat_expansion_panel7.key_principles: Key Principles in Working with Cards

principle1.part1: Before each card draw, it is recommended to ask a question.
principle1.part2: After drawing the card, allow time for the chooser to introspect the card and for the question asked to resonate.
principle1.part3: Do not rush to ask another question.

principle2.part1: The truth is in the eyes of the card chooser and therefore all the answers are correct.
principle2.part2: There is no good or bad outcome.
principle2.part3: The way the card chooser relates to his cards, expresses his personal perception and beliefs.
principle2.part4: It is right to allow full legitimacy for choice and personal interpretation in order to create a safe space.

principle3.part1: The guidebook offered for each card set is only a recommendation,
principle3.part2: It is not mandatory and we even encourage you, to write your own questions and ideas and therefore we have created a dedicated place in the guidebook where you can type things before the meeting starts and even during it.

principle4.part1: At any given moment it is possible to add or replace a card.
principle4.part2: Before doing so, it is recommended to ask the card chooser - what in this card creates resistance in you?
principle4.part3: What is the reason you did not connect to the card? There are no good or bad cards.

principle5.part1: The choice of cards is correct for the present time and describes the interpretation, feelings, existence, and spirit of the card chooser at this moment.
principle5.part2: At a different time or situation, a different reaction may arise.

mat_expansion_panel_header.mat_panel_title: How to Work with a Digital Card Set?

mat_expansion_panel8.first_step: Once you have chosen a card set to work with, you have 5 buttons at the top of the screen:

flip_cards_button.normal: By clicking on the button, you can choose which side of the cards will be visible.

display_number_cards_button.normal: By clicking on the button, you can mark up to 5 cards and display them in an enlarged form on the screen.

shuffle_button.normal: Like in the "real world", clicking on the shuffle button changes the order of the cards.

display_random_card_button.normal: By clicking on the button, a random card will be selected from the card set and displayed in an enlarged form on the screen.

edit_button.normal: Allows hiding of specific cards. By clicking on the button, you can hide cards that you do not want to work with at the current time. Once you exit the card set or refresh the page, all the cards you chose to hide will reappear.

guidebook_button.normal: Opens in a separate screen. Contains a description of the specific card set, questions and ideas for one-on-one work, process work and group work divided into visible or hidden cards.

benefits.adaptContentTitle: Adapting content and strategy to digital
benefits.adaptContentDescription: Our team will read your content and make adjustments to digital at the professional level (by mutual decision and if necessary).
benefits.premiumUserDescription: VIP user with no time limit to the Mentor-cards site that allows use of all card sets on our site.
benefits.digitalizationDescription: Your card set is adapted to digital - mixing, drawing a random card, hidden cards, revealed, displaying a number of cards on the screen and more! Everything we open in the future for our card sets, we will also open for you.
benefits.creatorDescription: Personal and business presentation on the card set page permanently. Exposure to all Mentor-cards customers in the present and future.
benefits.networkLaunchDescription: Launching the card set in the Facebook group, Instagram, and initiator mailing to all Mentor-cards customers in the past and present. A target audience of thousands of coaches, therapists, and group leaders will be exposed to your digital card set.
benefits.purchaseLinkTitle: Link to purchase the card set
benefits.purchaseLinkDescription: In the launch post and on the card set page on the site permanently there will be a link that refers customers to a selected page to purchase your card set.

workshop1.workshopDescription: Everything you need to know about working with online casting cards
workshop1.suitableForDescription: Colleges and schools, coaches, therapists, educators, group leaders and people who work with people.

benefits.keyPrinciples: Key principles in working with casting cards.
benefits.existingOptions: What are the existing options for working with online casting cards?
benefits.whenToUseCards: When is it most recommended to incorporate cards into the guidance / coaching / treatment process?
benefits.examples: Examples of questions and techniques for working with online cards.
benefits.jointExperience: Joint experience - feeling how meaningful and powerful work with cards is.
benefits.resistance: Types of resistance to working with cards and how to cope.

workshop1.workshopDuration: The duration of the workshop is 3-5 hours depending on the number of participants

workshop2.workshopDescription: Values as a connecting tool between employees and the organization
workshop2.suitableForDescription: Private and public organizations, institutional bodies that aspire to create a connection between the management staff and the employees and the core values of the organization in a creative and experiential way.

benefits.valueDefinition: Definition of the concept of value - what is a value and why is it important to know my leading values and those of the organization in which I work?
benefits.personalValues: Personal acquaintance of each employee with his values and the establishment of his personal value ladder.
benefits.thinkingGroups: Thinking groups: finding and defining the 5 core values of the organization through a card game (the hardest you played).
benefits.connectingValues: How do we connect the values we found to the purpose and vision of the organization?
benefits.opposingValues: What to do when an employee / colleague of mine acts contrary to values?

workshop2.workshopDuration: The duration of the workshop is 4-6 hours depending on the number of participants

affiliates-page.top-container-body: Our affiliate program will allow you, in addition to additional and regular income, to receive professional tools from us, meetings with new customers, networking and business opportunities.
affiliates-page.card-container-header: What does it mean in practice?
affiliates-page.card-container-header-container: Being our partners comes with many cool things: commissions from profits, fast support and personal attention, personal benefits for your customers, exposure to potential audience, and most importantly - joining our professional partners community!

card2.card-container: Do you have your own card set? We will create a digital version for you on our site with all your details! (Your copyrights are at the top of our priorities) + Direct link to purchase your physical card set!

card1.card-container: 10% from system licenses for every paying customer who came through you

card4.card-header: We cultivate a community with you
card4.card-container1: Position yourself as an authority in our community
card4.card-container3: Professional training, networking meetings and more treats!

card3.card-container1: Free system license - all card sets open at no cost, for your professionalization in the system - Walk the Talk!
card3.card-container2: 25% discount for those who register through you on their first payment

affiliates-page.card-container-footer: Who is the program intended for?

form.title: How to join?
form.body: Super simple! Leave your details here and we will get back to you with all the details:

affiliates-page.footer: So what do you say, shall we be partners?

content.title: 4-day promotion only
content.subtitle: View-Point card deck delivered to your home as a gift
content.no-plan-link-red: Explore the Decks Waiting for You

content.title2: A home for digital card sets
content.description1: Welcome to the right era, the space where projective work cards are digital.
content.description2: At Mentor-Cards you will find digital card sets on any subject and for any need, as well as guidebooks, activation ideas, and inspiring guiding questions. All this is divided by categories and goals: group meetings, personal meetings, process work, with groups and more.
content.description3: If you belong to the professions of therapy, guidance, coaching, management, educators, lecturers, or simply people who love working with people – Mentor-Cards is your winning card.

content.title: All Card Packs
content.search-placeholder: What is the topic of your meeting? Look for a kit

content.description1: Mentor-Cards are much more than projective card sets.
content.description2: In addition to full access to a huge database of constantly updated sets, you can enjoy a huge variety of guidebooks on various topics, activation ideas, and inspiring guiding questions. All this is divided by categories and goals: group meetings, personal meetings, process work, with groups and more.
content.description3: From word cards to picture cards, from message cards to question cards, from opening cards to subconscious bypass cards – we have a set for every method!
content.description4: Try it, you might fall in love
content.description5: Two card sets are available for you to try, without a subscription and without commitment, offered with love.
content.description6: Feel free to experience, try and discover how Mentor-Cards is everything you were looking for.

content.title: How to use Mentor-Cards?
content.subtitle: Mentor-Cards is the place that gives you access to dozens of card sets at any time and anywhere:
content.description1: -In 1*1 personal meetings using a mobile phone or tablet
content.description3: -On a school campus, in group guidance

follow-us.text: Want to get more tips and ideas? Follow us

content.description1: If you are not yet addicted or familiar enough with all the goodness of working with projective cards, let's reveal some advantages
content.description3: or for your patients and clients:

advantages.description1: Our thinking brain is full of fears, limiting beliefs, and inhibitions. Cards are a projective tool that allows us to connect to the true desire that
advantages.description2: is often well hidden in the depths of the subconscious. In other words – processes are shortened and discoveries are surprising.

advantages.description: Cards are much more than cards, they create an opportunity for indirect dialogue in sensitive places where it hurts too much to approach. A possible and gentle way for healing and recovery dialogue, an opportunity for significant closeness between the person and themselves.
Working with cards opens the heart and mind. Using cards makes every meeting unforgettable, dynamic, and interactive. The fun way to increase involvement in the process and success.

content.description1: Most of us order food through an app and read books in digital format. The appearance of card therapy sets was only a matter of time.
content.description2: Single-use products will join our usual way of consuming our products and appear online.
content.description3: Mentor-Cards is a digital paradise for you – an endless number of card sets, learning materials, and inspiration in a current variety that suits everyone from your clients or goals.
content.description5: Just connect to your mobile phone, computer or tablet from anywhere in Israel or the world and enjoy the user-friendly and easy-to-use interface you already know! simple
content.description8: Just connect to your mobile phone, computer or tablet from anywhere in Israel or the world and enjoy the user-friendly and easy-to-use interface you already know! simple

content.description1: Mentor-Cards is much more than an easy-to-use platform, ideas, and inspiration for digital card sets. Here is the stage and place to also include you and your sets in the picture.
content.description2: Earn commissions, expand the customer circle, enjoy tutorials, nurture a community, and much more.
content.description3: Do you have sets that everyone must work with, know and see? Come be our partners.

button.text: I want my deck to appear on Mentor-Cards!

content.description3: Hi, nice to meet you, Yarden Stampu, people who dream and mostly fulfill, partners in the way and the vision. Out of a desire to enable growth and development for thousands of therapists and coaches in Israel and around the world, we built a friendly and super intuitive platform for our users, where they can work with cards in front of their clients. All this in online meetings exactly in the same way they used to in face-to-face meetings, with guidebooks full of explanations and examples. With one significant difference – without carrying, without effort, without feeling like dinosaurs. 😊
content.description4: And no less important, with a lot of room for our service and the desire to be your address for anything or any card.

content.title: News and updates
content.description1: We are constantly innovating and improving and our system is constantly being updated,
content.description2: you should see what's new with us.

updates.description: We have added a new feature for interactive joint work on the site! Click on the link inside the card set, send it to others on WhatsApp and they have free access to the card set on the site for a whole 3 hours! Try it, it's genius :)
We have renewed the emoji set! Now waiting for you in the set are 80 different and familiar emoji cards. Works wonderfully with children and teenagers, and of course, with adults :)
Ahead of the Purim holiday, we have opened access to the mask set for everyone! 👹🤠🤡

content.title: Talk to us in cards
content.description: We will be happy to serve you on any topic!

summery.rule1: All information and/or display on the site including graphics, design, verbal presentation, trademarks, "logo" signs and their editing and presentation are the exclusive property of the site and may not be copied, duplicated, distributed, publicly displayed, transferred to a third party, published or used in any other way in the contents appearing on the site, unless the site has given its consent to do so in writing and in advance.
summery.rule2: The site will not be responsible for any direct or indirect damage, bodily, financial or other, caused to a person or a visitor to the site as a result of using the information appearing on the site.
summery.rule3: The information appearing on the site should be seen as auxiliary information only.
summery.rule4: Those interested in displaying content from this site or collaborations should contact Mentor-cards in writing and only after our written approval can you use the contents.
summery.rule5: Mentor-cards reserves copyright and all content of the site is original or has appropriate approvals.
summery.rule6: The availability of card packs and content may change from time to time.
